|goon=し
|kanon=し
|toon=す
|soon=つ
|kun=こ-, ね-, み-
|nanori=このえ, さね, しげ, しげる, たか, ただ, たね, ちか, つぐ, とし, みる, やす
}}

subSections.title: Compounds
Usage notes
subSections.text: {{ja-l||子}} is also an obsolete variant form of the katakana {{m|ja|ネ|tr=ne}}.

subSections.title: Etymology 1
Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|y=k|こ|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR,NHK}}

subSections.title: Alternative forms
subSections.text:
* {{s|[[child]]}} {{ja-l|児}} {{q|less commonly used}}
* {{s|[[girl]]}} {{ja-l|娘}}

subSections.title: Noun
Derived terms
Prefix
subSections.text:
{{ja-pos|prefix|こ}}

# an [[object]] which has a [[subservient]] or [[derivative]] role relative to another object
#: {{m|ja|子会社|'''子'''会社|tr='''ko'''gaisha}}: '''derivative''' + [[company]] → a [[subsidiary]]
#: {{m|ja|子犬|'''子'''犬|tr='''ko'''inu}}: '''derivative''' + [[dog]] → a [[puppy]]

subSections.title: Derived terms
Suffix
Derived terms
Proper noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-pos|proper|こ}}

# {{surname|lang=ja|A=a|nodot=1|sort=こ}}

subSections.title: Etymology 2
Pronunciation
subSections.text:
{{ja-pron|y=o|し|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR}}
{{ja-pron|y=to|す|dev=1|acc_note=second reading less common, only used in word-final position}}<!--{{IPA|lang=ja|[sɯᵝ]}}-->

subSections.title: Affix
Usage notes
subSections.text:
* This affix is never used in isolation. It is only used in {{l|ja|sc=Latn|音読み|''on'yomi''}} compounds.
* In some kanji compounds, {{ja-l||子}} is part of the word but does not carry much meaning in Japanese, as in {{m|ja|椅子|tr=isu||[[chair]]}}. Possibly because of this erosion of meaning, spelling out {{lang|ja|子}} in some compounds has become optional, as in {{m|ja|椰子}} vs. {{m|ja|椰|tr=yashi||a [[palm tree]]}}, or {{m|ja|柚子}} vs. {{m|ja|柚|tr=[[yuzu]]||an [[aromatic]] [[citron]]}}.
* In some compounds, the ''shi'' or ''su'' reading becomes voiced as ''ji'' or ''zu'' due to [[Appendix:Japanese_glossary#rendaku|rendaku]].

subSections.title: Derived terms
Pronoun
subSections.text:
{{ja-pos|pronoun|し}}

# {{lb|ja|archaic|sort=し}} ''[[second-person]] [[pronoun]]'': [[you]] {{gl|of one's [[equal]]s}}

subSections.title: Proper noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-pos|proper|し}}

# {{lb|ja|Chinese astrology|sort=ね}} [[Rat]], the first of the twelve {{w|Earthly Branches}}

subSections.title: Etymology 3
subSections.text:
{{wp|lang=ja|子 (十二支)}} {{wp|Rat (zodiac)}}
{{ja-kanjitab|ね|yomi=k}} Contracted from {{m|ja|鼠|tr=nezumi||[[mouse]], [[rat]]}}.

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|acc=0|y=k|ね}}

subSections.title: Proper noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-pos|proper|ね}}

# {{lb|ja|Chinese astrology|sort=ね}} [[Rat]], the first of the twelve {{w|Earthly Branches}}:
## [[north]]
##: {{syn|ja|北|tr=kita}}
## the [[hour]]s between 11:00 [[P.M.]]/[[midnight]] and 1:00/2:00 [[A.M.]]
## a [[day]] or [[year]] assigned to the Rat
## the [[eleven]]th [[month]] of the [[lunar calendar]]
# ''a [[place name]]''

subSections.title: Derived terms
Syllable
subSections.text:
{{head|ja|syllable|sort=ね|tr=ne}} # {{lb|ja|dated|until the 19th century}} variant katakana syllable [[ネ]] (ne). #* {{ruby|[剥篤](ポット)[亞斯](アス)蘭 「シ'''子'''レス、カラーヘルラチ」羅
[…] 是ヲ燒ク法、曠野ニ一大坑ヲ穿チ其底ト内圍ニ[遍](アマ'''子''')ク瓦磗ヲ[敷](シキ)連'''子'''、樹ノ幹枝𪜈ニ[截](キリ)テ其内ニ積ミ[焚](モヤ)シ[了](オハリ)テ煙消シ通紅トナルトキ[尋常](ツ'''子''')ノ[灰汁](アク)ヲ取テ少シ[宛](ツヽ)頻〻ニ[撒](マキチラ)ストキハ其灰ノ鹽氣凝結𬼀堅キ塊片トナル。}} ({{w|Udagawa Yōan|{{smallcaps|Udagawa}} Yōan}}, 遠西医方名物考, [http://archive.wul.waseda.ac.jp/kosho/ya09/ya09_00857/ya09_00857_0004/ya09_00857_0004_p0013.jpg vol. 4], 1822) #* 小杉イ'''子'''議員 ([http://houseikyoku.sangiin.go.jp/sanhouichiran/kaijibetu/r-001.htm 第1回国会参法一覧])

subSections.title: Etymology 4
subSections.text: {{ja-kanjitab|み|yomi=k}}

{{ja-noun|み}}

# {{lb|ja|archaic|rare}} {{altspell|lang=ja|実|tr=mi|nodot=1|sort=み}}: a [[fruit]], [[nut]], or [[seed]] {{gl|of a [[plant]], [[tree]], etc.}}; [[ingredient]]s put in a [[soup]]; a [[content]], [[substance]]
